type.name: org.gradle.api.artifacts.ComponentMetadataDetails
type.description: Describes a resolved component's metadata, which typically originates from a component descriptor (Ivy file, Maven POM). Some parts of the metadata can be changed via metadata rules (see org.gradle.api.artifacts.dsl.ComponentMetadataHandler. @since 1.8

method.name: setChanging
method.description:
Sets whether the component is changing or immutable.
param:changing whether the component is changing or immutable

method.name: setStatus
method.description:
Sets the status of the component. Must match one of the values in #getStatusScheme().
param:status the status of the component

method.name: setStatusScheme
method.description:
Sets the status scheme of the component. Values are ordered from least to most mature status.
param:statusScheme the status scheme of the component

property.name: changing
property.description:
Sets whether the component is changing or immutable.
param:changing whether the component is changing or immutable

property.name: status
property.description:
Sets the status of the component. Must match one of the values in #getStatusScheme().
param:status the status of the component

property.name: statusScheme
property.description:
Sets the status scheme of the component. Values are ordered from least to most mature status.
param:statusScheme the status scheme of the component
